wikipedia_page.main: Gillian Shelley Mary Rohde (17 May 1933 – 6 December 2007) was a British journalist and author. She was best known in North West England as a reporter and presenter on Granada Reports, but she is more widely remembered as the biographer of the artist L. S. Lowry.

response: * Shelley Rohde (1933-2007), British journalist and author
* 17 May – Shelley Rohde, journalist and author (died 2007)
